title: Leicester PATT Rolling Grant
abstractText: This proposal is for travel funds to support a wide range of ground-based observing carried out by the X-ray and Observational Astronomy Group at Leicester.
impactText: Findings resulting from this travel grant have been used to further our understanding of the Universe. Other Cultural
findingsText: This travel grant has enabled astronomers to discover new knowledge about the Universe. The data gathered through this travel grant are publically available after 1 year for others to use. Other
